Package ResManApp

Class Customer

java.lang.Object
ResManApp.Customer
public class Customer
extends java.lang.Object
maintains information about the customers.

      public Customer​(int ssn, java.lang.String name, char gender, java.util.Date dateOfBirth, java.util.Date registrationDate)
      a constructor for customer with variables
      Parameters:
      ssn - keeps customer ssn, takes from user, uses as primary key for customers list
      name - keeps customer name, takes from user
      gender - keeps customer gender, takes from user
      dateOfBirth - keeps customer birth date, takes from user
      registrationDate - keeps customer registration date, takes from user
